entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 9:02AM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER CONTINUES FOR THE FAR NORTHERN PANHANDLE... AK DOT reported 8 to 12 inches snow for the Haines and Chilkat Valley were received overnight with snow still falling moderately but will mix with rain this morning near Haines. Snow rates are starting to lighten this morning around the area as the front starts to move into Canada.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan

entry.summary: ...THE WINTER/SPRING FLOOD POTENTIAL IS ABOVE NORMAL ACROSS MOST OF SOUTHERN NEW ENGLAND...
